{"id":550655308,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1630972015,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"31 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/550655308/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"17.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& matrix) {\n    for (int i = 0; i < matrix.at(0).size(); i++) {\n        int item = matrix[0][i];\n        int j = i;\n        int f = 0;\n        while (j + 1 < matrix.at(0).size() and f + 1 < matrix.size()) {\n            if (item != matrix[f + 1][j + 1]) {\n                return false;\n            } \n            j++;\n            f++;\n        }\n    }\n\n    for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size(); i++) {\n        int item = matrix[i][0];\n        int j = i;\n        int f = 0;\n        while (j + 1 < matrix.size() and f + 1 < matrix.at(0).size()) {\n            if (item != matrix[j + 1][f + 1]) {\n                return false;\n            } \n            j++;\n            f++;\n        }\n    }\n    return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
